src_original: mahāsandhi mahāmudra mahāsamayabandhaka /  mahāmuṣṭe samudrāgrya vajramuṣṭe namo 'stu te // 16 //  vandyo mānyaśca pūjyaśca satkartavyastathāgataiḥ /
tgt_original: mahāsandhi mahāmudra mahāsamayabandhaka |  mahāmuṣṭe samudrāgrya vajramuṣṭe namo'stu te || 16 ||  vandyo mānyaśca pūjyaśca satkartavyastathāgataiḥ |

src_original: namaste vajrasattvāya vajraratnāya ca te namaḥ /
namaste vajradharmāya namaste vajrakarmaṇe // 19 //  tvāmabhiṣṭutya nāmāgraiḥ praṇamya ca subhāvataḥ /  yatpuṇyaṃ tena sarvo hi buddhabodhimavāpnuyāt // 20 //

tgt_original: mahāsattva mahāvīrya mahopāya namo'stu te || 2 ||  vajrarāga mahāśuddha sarvasaukhya mahāsukha |  sukhāgryānādinidhana mahākāma namo'stu te || 3 ||
